name: At The Island Of Madness
description:
Monsters have overcome the island you've been sent to. 

Fight, explore and collect around the island, discovering  the uncertain.

Content/Features:

Weapons: Sniper, M4A1, AK47, 1911, Makarov, UMP, UZIs, Katana, Knife, Bat, Bow

Items: Flashlight, Phone

Map: Large Island, high peak mountains in the center of island. Cabins spread around parts of map.

AI: Melee, Animal

Tab = Inventory

Abilities:

Jump + Q   = Speed Dash

E Hold = Slow Time

At The Island Of Madness will be worked on and updated. Ideas and plans will be released in devlogs going into the future.

Grey Cypher Studios
